#summary Data binding library & GWT data-aware widgets.
#sidebar TableOfContents

= Introduction =

The data dinding library contains classes and interfaces that provide basic data access. The library contains also a few widgets (so far) like DBTextBox, DBLabel, DBListBox and DBLookupListBox capable of accessing (database) data.
